Sentencas: Analysis of a large amount of experimental oxygen ion and proton conductivity data has made it possible to identify general trends in the behavior of the transport properties of both undoped and doped rare-earth pyrochlores.

Sentencas: In the case of the rare-earth titanate, zirconate, and hafnate pyrochlores, the tolerance factor G has been shown to be a good criterion that allows highly conductive compounds to be predicted.
